name: Quickdraw Synchron
text: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by sending 1 monster from your hand to the GY. For a Synchro Summon, you can substitute this card for any 1 "Synchron" Tuner. Cannot be used as a Synchro Material, except for the Synchro Summon of a monster that lists a "Synchron" Tuner as material.
